scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o public/css/header.min.css src/css/header.css && cleancss -o public/css/style.min.css src/css/style.css
scripts.minify:js: terser src/javascript/typed.js -o public/js/typed.min.js && terser src/javascript/components.js -o public/js/components.min.js && terser src/javascript/index.js -o public/js/index.min.js && terser src/javascript/zeromd.js -o public/js/zeromd.min.js
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir public --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.build: bun run minify:css && bun run minify:js && bun run minify:html
